body_html:
I'm closing this issue, as the results do seem to be based on ordering of floating point operations, as in the results from the forward passes started differing after a few epochs by inspecting some float.hex values, indeed suggesting minor differences from the ordering of ops.

It was initially surprising that the number of threads made a difference (my usual field doesn't exhibit anywhere near this level of sensitivity), as does the architecture being run on (which was a further issue we encountered).

body:
I'm closing this issue, as the results do seem to be based on ordering of floating point operations, as in the results from the forward passes started differing after a few epochs by inspecting some `float.hex` values, indeed suggesting minor differences from the ordering of ops.

It was initially surprising that the number of threads made a difference (my usual field doesn't exhibit anywhere near this level of sensitivity), as does the architecture being run on (which was a further issue we encountered).
